text: Corrections Nurse - LPN. Currently looking for qualified Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) candidates for a variety of Corrections opportunities. We are currently staffing assignments in Pendleton, along with other opportunities throughout the Indianapolis area! Interested candidates must have recent relevant experience be able to remain calm under pressure. Full Time & PRN are available for staffing. Day/Night shifts available. Pay is $34 per hour. Benefits for the Corrections Nurse - LPN. Flexible schedule. Weekly pay. Bonus opportunities (Quarterly & Referral). Healthcare premium reimbursements. Responsibilities of the Corrections Nurse -LPN. Effectively triage patients. Organize and deliver the care of a group of residents with needs of varying complexity. Safely implement nursing care, in keeping with standards of care, practice, policy, and procedures with attention to physical, emotional, social, spiritual, cultural, and age specific needs, while preserving the residents’ dignity and autonomy. Initiate effective actions in emergencies. Requirements of the Corrections Nurse - LPN. 1-2 years of recent and related experience is required. Must be able to work effectively independently, yet work together as part of a team. Must be able to remain calm under pressure. Proficient at taking vital signs and administering medication accordingly.

Corrections Nurse - LPN

Currently looking for qualified Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN)\u00a0 candidates for a variety of Corrections opportunities. We are currently staffing assignments in Pendleton, along with other opportunities throughout the Indianapolis area!\u00a0 Interested candidates must have recent relevant experience be able to remain calm under pressure. Full Time & PRN are available for staffing. Day/Night shifts available. Pay is $34\u00a0per hour.
\u00a0
Benefits for the Corrections Nurse - LPN

  • Flexible schedule
  • Weekly pay
  • Bonus opportunities (Quarterly & Referral)
  • Healthcare premium reimbursements

\u00a0
Responsibilities of the Corrections Nurse -LPN

  • Effectively triage patients.
  • Organize and deliver the care of a group of residents with needs of varying complexity.
  • Safely implement nursing care, in keeping with standards of care, practice, policy, and procedures with attention to physical, emotional, social, spiritual, cultural, and age specific needs, while preserving the residents\u2019 dignity and autonomy.
  • Initiate effective actions in emergencies.

Requirements of the Corrections Nurse - LPN

  • 1-2 years of recent and related experience is required
  • Must be able to work effectively independently, yet work together as part of a team
  • Must be able to remain calm under pressure
  • Proficient at taking vital signs and administering medication accordingly
